subtitle.message: Extract your AliExpress order details to a printable PDF

welcome_step1.message: 1- Using the add-on is extremely easy. Go to your Aliexpress orders by clicking on the add-on logo, then click on the orange button.

welcome_step2.message: 2- Open the details page for the order in question.

welcome_step3.message: 3- Once on the page opened, click on "Download PDF Invoice". This action will scrape the data from the page, generate an invoice in PDF form and then open a file saving dialog.

welcome_step4.message: 4- Once saved, the PDF will look similar to this.
